ygData.subject: Re: Rondo's tongue?
ygData.msgSnippet: I am trying to find out the same thing. If I ever find out I will let the list know what to do. Panoyen of Kelethin Fennin Ro ... most
ygData.messageBody:
I am trying to find out the same thing. If I ever find out I will let the
list know what to do.

Panoyen of Kelethin
Fennin Ro

> Hi there. Last night I was in Crushbone doing a little orcing and I
> noticed a NPC named Rondo down in the slave pits. This is unusual, as
most
> othe the slaves are simply listed by race ("a woodelf slave", a dwarven
> slave", "a halfling slave", etc). Anyway, sometime during a fight he
> jumped me, proclaiming to be a member of the Dwarven Bandits, and I had to
> whack him. When I went to loot the body, there was his tongue. I figured
> to was too disgusting not to be a quest item, but which quest and where
> does it start? Any help would be greatly appreciated.
>
> -Dan Alexander
> Pennaggolan of Felwithe
> Faydwer, Fennin Ro
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Are you hogging all the fun?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Friends tell friends about ONElist!
>
